attributes.action: Demand the immediate release of Gillian Gibbons in Sudan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In this day and age we are quite open to all peoples and their religions, but, it is not acceptable to have any form of physical punishment for calling a teddy the same name as a religious figure.

rejection.details: Mrs Gibbons has now been released.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
